Section.Catchline: Requirements for reinstitution of lobbyist registration after felony conviction.

SectionBody.Text: A person convicted of a felony after January 1, 2006, may not be registered as a lobbyist pursuant to s. 112.3215 until the person:

Subsection.Text: Has been released from incarceration and any postconviction supervision, and has paid all court costs and court-ordered restitution; and
Has had his or her civil rights restored.
